Whether youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢re a new or an aspiring Pom owner, Pomeranians For Dummies fills you in on everything you need to know to find, choose, raise, care for, and have a ball with a member of that outstanding breed of dog.
